item.title: RealHighway Mod
item.description: Refer to the RealHighway Mod feature guide to understand how to use these components. The documentation on this page is in progress. The contents of this document are undergoing revision and are subject to change. Network and FLEX Piece Capabilities # Key # Yes This particular feature can be constructed, with minimal (if any) limitations. Partial Support This particular feature can be constructed, but not in all instances. Details will be given as to what is/is not possible.
